project.title: La Negra Angustias: Annotated Edition of a Mexican Golden Age Film
project.description: A digital annotated edition of Matilde Landetaâ€™s 1950 film "La Negra Angustias," exploring gender nonconformity, racial difference, and postrevolutionary cinematic nationhood in Mexico. Built using AVAnnotate and IIIF, this public humanities project pairs audiovisual annotations with metadata and contextual analysis.
project.creator: fgarcia-eng
